TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSecureResolver extends System.Xml.XmlResolver

summary.span: 以包裝 物件，並限制基礎 所能存取的資源，來協助保護其他 實作的安全性。

span.span: Helps to secure another implementation of by wrapping the object and restricting the resources that the underlying has access to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是 命名空間中所有類別的預設解析程式。The class is the default resolver for all classes in the namespace. 它用來載入 XML 文件，來解析外部資源，例如實體、 Dtd 或結構描述，以及匯入或 include 指示詞。It is used to load XML documents and to resolve external resources such as entities, DTDs or schemas, and import or include directives. 您可以藉由指定覆寫此預設若要使用的物件。You can override this default by specifying the object to use. 例如，如果您想要限制的資源，基礎可以存取，您可以使用物件。For example, if you want to restrict the resources that the underlying can access, you can use an object. 包裝的具體實作，並限制資源的基礎具有存取權。 wraps around a concrete implementation of and restricts the resources that the underlying has access to. 比方說，能夠禁止跨網域重新導向，它會從內嵌的統一資源識別元 (URI) 參考。For example, has the ability to prohibit cross-domain redirection, which occurs from an embedded Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) reference. 當您建構物件，您提供有效實作的 URL，辨識項物件或權限集的執行個體由以及來判斷安全性。When you construct an object, you provide a valid implementation along with a URL, an instance of an evidence object, or a permission set, which is used by the to determine security. 任一會產生或在使用現有工作區並呼叫它來協助保護基礎。Either a is generated or the existing one is used and is called on it to help secure the underlying . > [!IMPORTANT] > 物件可以包含機密資訊 (如使用者認證)。 objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials. 您應該快取時請小心物件，並不應將傳遞物件到不受信任的元件。You should be careful when caching objects and should not pass the object to an untrusted component. > [!IMPORTANT] > 有安全性基礎結構在.NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) 上執行的程式碼和整合在 Microsoft SQL Server 2005 在 CLR 上執行的程式碼中的差異。There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005. 這可能會導致整合開發的.NET Framework CLR 的操作方式與在 SQL Server 上使用的程式碼 CLR 的情況下。This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR. 其中一種差異會影響類別就以 URL 為基礎的辨識項 (也就是當您使用方法或建構函式)。One of these differences affects the class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the method or the constructor). 原則解析的 SQL server 的機制整合 CLR 不會使用或資訊。The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the or information. 相反地，它會授與伺服器新增時載入的組件的 GUID 為基礎的權限。Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded. 當您使用在 SQL Server 整合的 CLR，請使用指定的直接提供任何必要的辨識項。When you use the in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified . ## 若要使用安全的解析程式To use a secure resolver 1. 建立具有正確使用權限集合的 物件。Create an with the correct permission set. 2. 建立使用 物件的 物件。Create an object that uses the object. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#5a)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#5a)] 3. 傳遞物件至方法建立時物件。Pass the object to the method when you're creating the object. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#5b)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#5b)] ## 若要使用 URL 限制存取To restrict access by using a URL 使用建構函式建立允許存取僅限您本機內部網路站台的物件。Use the constructor to create an object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#3)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#3)] ## 若要使用的權限集合來限制存取To restrict access by using a permission set 1. 建立 物件。Create a object. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4a](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#4a)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4a](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#4a)] 2. 指定您想要允許存取的 Url。Specify the URLs that you want to allow access to. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4b](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#4b)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4b](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#4b)] 3. 將 Web 使用權限加入至 物件。Add the web permissions to the object. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#4c)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#4c)] 4. 使用建構函式建立所使用的權限集合的物件。Use the constructor to create an object by using the permission set. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#4d)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#4d)] 請參閱另一個範例的參考頁面。See the reference page for another example. ## 若要使用的辨識項來限制存取To restrict access by using evidence 您可以使用來限制存取建構函式，並指定。You can restrict access by using the constructor and specifying . 可用於建立 ，其會套用至基礎 。The is used to create the that is applied to the underlying . 在開啟任何資源之前， 都會呼叫已建立之 上的 。The calls on the created before opening any resources. 以下是一些常見的案例，以及為每個提供的辨識項型別：Here are some common scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each: - 如果您使用的完全信任環境中，使用您的組件建立辨識項：If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#1)] - 如果您使用非完全信任環境中，您有程式碼或來自外部來源的資料，您知道外部來源的原始和已驗證的 URI，請使用 URI 建立辨識項：If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#2)] - 如果您在完全信任的環境，而且您有程式碼或來自外部來源的資料，但您不知道的外部來源中，原點是：If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: 將 `evidence` 參數設定為 `null`。Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`. 這可以拒絕對資源的任何存取。This allows no access to resources. -或--or- 如果應用程式需要資源的某些存取權，請要求呼叫端的辨識項。If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller. ## 若要使用安全的解析程式載入 XSLT 樣式表To use the secure resolver to load an XSLT style sheet 1. 建立具有正確使用權限集合的 物件。Create an with the correct permission set. 2. 將 傳遞至 方法。Pass the to the method. [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#6)]

span.para: 這個類別具有繼承要求。完全信任，才能繼承自類別。
This class has an inheritance demand. Full trust is required to inherit from the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三個建構函式會提供三種類型的存取限制：The three constructors provide three types of access restrictions: - 建構函式會使用 URL 限制存取。The constructor restricts access by using a URL. - 建構函式會使用的權限集合來限制存取。The constructor restricts access by using a permission set. - 建構函式會藉由使用辨識項來限制存取。The constructor restricts access by using evidence. 請參閱限制這些類型的範例中的建構函式的參考主題。See the constructor reference topics for examples of these types of restrictions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是一些可能的案例，以及每個案例所提供的辨識項型別：Here are some possible scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each scenario: - 如果您使用的完全信任環境中，使用您的組件建立辨識項：If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#1)] - 如果您使用非完全信任環境中，您有程式碼或來自外部來源的資料，您知道外部來源的原始和已驗證的 URI，請使用 URI 建立辨識項：If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-csharp[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/CS/XmlSecureResolver_ex.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSecureResolver_Samples/VB/XmlSecureResolver_ex.vb#2)] - 如果您在完全信任的環境，而且您有程式碼或來自外部來源的資料，但您不知道的外部來源中，原點是：If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: 將 `evidence` 參數設定為 `null`。Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`. 這可以拒絕對資源的任何存取。This allows no access to resources. -或--or- 如果應用程式需要資源的某些存取權，請要求呼叫端的辨識項。If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 有安全性基礎結構在.NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) 上執行的程式碼和整合在 Microsoft SQL Server 2005 在 CLR 上執行的程式碼中的差異。There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005. 這可能會導致整合開發的.NET Framework CLR 的操作方式與在 SQL Server 上使用的程式碼 CLR 的情況下。This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR. 其中一種差異會影響類別就以 URL 為基礎的辨識項 (也就是當您使用方法或建構函式)。One of these differences affects the class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the method or the constructor). 原則解析的 SQL server 的機制整合 CLR 不會使用或資訊。The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the or information. 相反地，它會授與伺服器新增時載入的組件的 GUID 為基礎的權限。Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded. 當您使用在 SQL Server 整合的 CLR，請使用指定的直接提供任何必要的辨識項。When you use the in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified . ## Examples 這個範例會使用建構函式建立允許存取僅限您本機內部網路站台的物件。This example uses the constructor to create an object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 您的應用程式可以減輕記憶體阻斷服務威脅方法，藉由實作，限制讀取的位元組數目。Your application can mitigate memory denial of service threats to the method by implementing an that limits the number of bytes read. 這有助於防止惡意程式碼嘗試將無限的資料流的位元組傳遞方法。This helps guard against situations where malicious code attempts to pass an infinite stream of bytes to the method.

exception.span: 既不是 也不是 型別。

span.span: is neither nor a type.

exception.span: 指定的 URI 並非絕對 URI。

span.span: The specified URI is not an absolute URI.
is .

exception.span: 發生執行階段錯誤 (例如中斷的伺服器連線)。

span.span: There is a runtime error (for example, an interrupted server connection).
